work.title: Growth: Notifications
work.description: Developed a number of notifications around Story Highlights and Direct Inbox using Django, conducting A/B testing to measure user impact and MAP gain.

work.title: Credit Experiences
work.description: Created a new experience for users with Collections using Scala, React, and GraphQL. Developed a contextual backlinking framework by passing location states within page queries.

work.title: Datasources Team
work.description: Created various data processing algorithms using NumPy, Pandas and MySQL to improve receipt item attribution. Implemented a full stack site that aggregates and displays brand demographic insights using Django.

work.title: Centralized Banking
work.description: Created a full stack web admin tool using ReactJS and Django for risk analysis and debugging of financial accounts. Improved querying speeds using database profiling, indexes, and Django QuerySet API optimizations.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
